content:
| Category Name | Description | Entity Name | Entity Value |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| support4258 | User wants to cancel an existing ticket. (Does not apply to tickets beginning with RITM.) | ticket.number | \b(?i)INC\d{7}\b |
| support8742 | User is requesting to connect with a support agent or speak with an IT service representative. | None | NA |
| support9302 | User needs to open a new IT incident ticket or request. User wants to create an INC or a RITM. | device.type | phone, computer, laptop |
| support2749 | User wants to check the status of a submitted request. | request.number | \b(?i)RITM\d{7}\b |

Determine if the below sample fits into the support2749 or support8742 categories.  With the categories you choose, provide the corresponding entities you can identify in the sample.   You cannot return any other categories except support2749 or support8742.  However, if both are applicable you can return both.  If neither category fits, please return the Category Name as "Empty" and return any entities you find in the sample, regardless of the intent they may belong to.  If neither category fits and no entities are found in the sample, please don't return any entity tags or labels. only return the category information as previously requested. Place your findings in json.

Sample:
I just realized I don't have Powerpoint installed. I need to open a request to install it on my computer.
